pkgmetadata.longdescription: A ggplot2 Extension to Visualize Two Variables per Color Aesthetic Through Color Space Projections // A ggplot2 extension to visualize two variables through one color aesthetic via mapping to a color space projection. With this technique for 2-D color mapping, one can create a dichotomous choropleth in R as well as other visualizations with bivariate color scales. Includes two new scales and a new guide for ggplot2.
